texts.1: We are a gamified social network focused on exercising, where you can create your own workouts, organize events with your friends while sharing your progress and earning xp!
texts.2: ShapeUp was born from the idea of encouraging people to continue exercising, creating a community that inspires with their progress and life change!

accordions.title: Information Collection
Use of Information
Information Disclosure
Information Protection
accordions.message: We take measures to protect your personal information against loss, misuse, unauthorized access, disclosure, or alteration.

accordions.title: Cookie Policy
accordions.message: We use cookies to enhance your experience on our platform. Cookies allow us to remember your preferences and personalize your experience. You can disable cookies in your browser, but this may affect your experience on our platform.

accordions.title: Privacy Rights
accordions.message: You have the right to access, correct, and delete your personal information, and we have the right to delete any type of publication that violates any terms.

accordions.title: Changes to the Privacy Policy
accordions.message:
We may modify this Privacy Policy at any time, and you will be notified of any significant changes. If you continue to use our services after the modification of this Privacy Policy, it will be considered as your acceptance of the new provisions.

Contact us if necessary:
shapeup@gmail.com

accordions.title: Use of the platform
User account
accordions.message: You must have an account to use our services. By creating an account, you agree to provide accurate and up-to-date information and to keep it up to date. You also agree to protect your account and keep your password secure. We will not allow account sharing or the use of accounts by other people.

accordions.title: Content ownership
accordions.message: You retain ownership of the content you post on our platform, but grant our social network a global, irrevocable, non-exclusive license to use, reproduce, modify, publish, and distribute the content on our platform.

accordions.title: Modifications to the terms of use
accordions.message: We may modify these terms of use at any time, and you will be notified of any significant changes. If you continue to use our services after the modification of the terms of use, this will be considered as your acceptance of the new terms.

accordions.title: Account termination
accordions.message: We may terminate your account at any time, for any reason, without notice. You may terminate your account at any time by following the instructions on our platform.

accordions.title: Limitation of liability
accordions.message: We are not responsible for any direct or indirect damages resulting from the use of our platform, including damages resulting from errors, omissions, or interruptions of services.

accordions.title: Applicable law and jurisdiction
accordions.message:
These terms of use are governed by the laws of the country where our social network is headquartered, and any disputes will be exclusively resolved by the courts of that country.

By using our services, you agree to comply with these terms of use. If you have any questions about these terms, please contact us.

accordions.title: Privacy
accordions.message:
We collect and use information in accordance with our privacy policy.

Contact us if needed:
shapeup@gmail.com

email.infoText: For security reasons, a code will be sent to your phone number. You will use it on the confirmation page.

accordions.title: Change profile picture
accordions.message: Access your profile page and click on the edit profile button on the right side. This will open a screen where you can edit your profile information and change your photo.

accordions.title: Change password
accordions.message: Access the settings page and click on the Account tab, then select Change Password. Enter your old and new passwords. If you don't remember your password, click on 'forgot password' and you will receive a code via SMS. After entering the code on the site, you will be able to change your password.

accordions.title: Delete my account
accordions.message: To delete your account, access the 'Account' section in the settings and select the 'Delete Account' option. Follow the instructions on the screen to confirm the deletion of your account.
